title: Don't hate on me for not recognizing this...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722133517im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NewStorm_6657.jpg)

YIKES! I’ve seriously tried and tried to identify this font, and for the life me, I can’t!

It’s close to a lot of fonts, but just isn’t quite “there”.

Thanks y’all!

john
author: herbsandspices

comments.content:
SWEET! Thanks so much paulstonier - that rocks.

I can’t believe I don’t own this font!

Best,  
john
